item.title: [Graphics]Tools and Frameworks, Tutorials and Documents
item.description: keywords: Graphics, Shading, Shader, Rendering, Tools and Frameworks, Tutorials and Documents Blogs Tuxedolabs Blog http://blog.tuxedolabs.com/ Self Shadow https://blog.selfshadow.com/ Wojciech Jarosz https://cs.dartmouth.edu/~wjarosz/ https://github.com/wkjarosz/rendering-bib http://taichi.graphics/ https://github.com/yuanming-hu/taichi Matt Pharr https://pharr.org/matt/ Institute of Computer Graphics and Algorithms, Vienna University of Technology, Austria. https://users.cg.tuwien.ac.at Realistic Graphics Lab(Switzerland) https://rgl.epfl.ch/publications Real-time Graphics R&D http://www.iryoku.com/ Graphics Programmer at Rockstar North http://www.aortiz.me/ Inigo Quilez http://iquilezles.org/index.html Tutorials Shader Development The complete shader development course(Unity) https://shaderdev.com/ OpenGL Learning Learn OpenGL
